item.title: Churchy
item.description: Churchy is a church management system build on top of Electron and Vue. It allows churches to manages their members and divisions. It has an authentication systems and access/actions restrictions depending on the user roles. It features a dashboard which shows statistics about the adhesions.

item.title: Bow
item.description: Bow is a PHP web application framework, developed by Franck DAKIA and its collaborators. It allows developpers to write modern PHP applications and makes development easier. I’m a member of the core development team.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Whoah! This is my very first blog post. It is a dream that becomes reality. I would like to thank you for your interest. I will show you my universe, share my knowledge and adventures with you.

item.title: Yoda
item.description: A simple and lightweight command-line tool for template parsing. It allows to replace shortcodes inside a text with their corresponding values. You might want to use Yoda if you want to bulk send the same email to different users without having to manually write their details.
